snippet: An exhibition at the East Hampton Historical Society on Long Island features photographs taken by residents in the aftermath of a hurricane that ripped across the East End in September 1938.
abstract: Exhibit The Long Island Express: Rare Photographs of East Hampton Town After the 1938 Hurricane, at the East Hampton Historical Society, features photographs taken by residents in the aftermath of a deadly hurricane that ripped across the East End in September 1938 (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: An exhibition at the East Hampton Historical Society on Long Island features photographs taken by residents in the aftermath of a hurricane that ripped across the East End in September 1938.

headline.seo: Photos of the ‘Long Island Express’ Hurricane of 1938 on Display in East Hampton, N.Y.
headline.main: When the Express Came to the East End
headline.print_headline: When the Express Came to the East End
